statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, name, investment_amount FROM user_profiles WHERE investment_preference = 'Stocks';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, email, investment_amount FROM user_profiles WHERE investment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY investment_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE investment_amount > 50000 ORDER BY investment_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY name;
SELECT user_id, name, investment_amount FROM user_profiles WHERE investment_preference = 'Stocks' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT name, age, investment_amount FROM user_profiles WHERE investment_amount < 10000 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM user_profiles WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM investment_preferences WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High';
SELECT user_id, investment_amount FROM investment_preferences WHERE investment_time_horizon > 5;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, risk_tolerance FROM user_profiles JOIN investment_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = investment_preferences.user_id WHERE investment_amount > 50000;

SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, risk_tolerance, investment_amount FROM user_profiles JOIN investment_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = investment_preferences.user_id WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High' AND investment_time_horizon > 5;

SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, risk_tolerance, investment_goals FROM user_profiles JOIN investment_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = investment_preferences.user_id WHERE investment_goals LIKE '%retirement%';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT user_id, full_name, age FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_id, address FROM UserProfiles WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, risk_tolerance, investment_horizon FROM InvestmentPreferences WHERE investment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, date_of_birth, address FROM UserProfiles WHERE full_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT user_id, risk_tolerance, investment_amount FROM InvestmentPreferences WHERE investment_horizon < 5 ORDER BY investment_amount ASC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, age, address FROM UserProfiles LEFT JOIN InvestmentPreferences ON UserProfiles.user_id = InvestmentPreferences.user_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.full_name, r.recommended_asset, r.investment_amount FROM UserProfiles u INNER JOIN RecommendedInvestments r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM investment_preferences ORDER BY time_horizon DESC;
SELECT user_id, asset_name, asset_value FROM user_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stock';
SELECT user_id, recommended_asset, recommendation_date FROM recommendation_history WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 AND city = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, risk_tolerance, investment_amount FROM investment_preferences WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_assets WHERE asset_type IN ('Real Estate', 'Stocks') AND asset_value > 100000 ORDER BY asset_value DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, recommended_asset, recommendation_date FROM recommendation_history WHERE recommendation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM user_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT * FROM investment_preferences ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_type='Deposit';
SELECT investment_type, recommended_amount, rationale FROM recommended_investments WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM investment_history WHERE investment_type='Stocks' AND investment_amount > 10000 ORDER BY investment_date DESC;
